author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Stock futures under pressure after S&P 500s best week since 1974
description: Heading into Monday's trading on Wall Street, the Dow and S&P 500 were both less than 20% off their February record highs.
content: Dow futures were pointing to a drop of about 100 points, less than 1%, at Monday's open. Similar projected declines for the S&P 500 were coming after the index's 12.1% advance last week, its best week since 1974. The Dow Jones Industrial Average surged ne… [+6063 chars]
